title: Apple Watch expected to get an Explorer Edition
content: The new version is for the extreme-sports crowd. New features are in the works such as a rubbery exterior and better impact resistance. There is no planned release date so far, but fans may hear more in late 2021 or early 2022.

title: Facebook Employees Headed Back To The Office
content: Starting May 10th, Facebook offices will be allowed to have 10% of the staff return. As vaccines become more and more available, this percentage will rise. However, all employees are allowed to work from home until July 2nd, if they wish.

title: A Helicopter On Mars!
content: NASA is planning to fly the first helicopter on Mars. The craft is called the Ingenuity and its purpose will be to take video and photos of the surface of the planet. The little chopper is actually already on Mars, but will be riding a rover for 30 to 60 days before it is launched.
